Articles.Content:
If the possible variants have more icons to be shown as fit into the slider list, sliding to the next variant does not move the slide of icons ...

So those options are visually hidden.

I'm curious: Does 1.5. add so many variants that it already happen in a stock game?

As a workaround, you should be able to clone the parts via MM and split the variants across both parts. Not quiet sure if that would actually be helpful, especially if you switch through variants fairly often during construction but it's the beast idea I can think of right now^^
It happens for me in a patch to have more variants of procedural fairing textures.
